name: latch
description: A testing language for constraint environments

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs && npx convert-extension cjs dist/cjs/ && rm -f dist/cjs/*.map
scripts.test: npm run debugtest && npm run primtest
scripts.debugtest: WABT='WABT/build' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/test/suite/debugger.test.ts
scripts.spectest: WABT='WABT/build' CORESUITE='core/' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/suite/spec.test.ts
scripts.primtest: WABT='WABT/build' npx mocha --exit --reporter src/framework/MochaReporter.ts --require ts-node/register --ui bdd ./src/test/suite/primitives.test.ts
